item.title: Shelter’s ‘Pet Guardianship’ Program Provides For Pets If Owners Die
item.description: Friends of Strays Animal Shelter in Florida offers peace of mind to people who worry about what would happen if their pet outlives them.

item.title: Rethink Loyalty: A Challenge To Retailers From Harvard-Backed Startup
item.description: The founders of Lisia have ambitions to shift the dial from points to a purpose-driven, lifestyle app.

item.title: What Happens To Gifted Kids When They Grow Up?
item.description: Two new studies published in Gifted Child Quarterly add to the longitudinal research evidence on gifted children.
